## Supported Automated Fitting of Distributions
    
  + Discrete Distributions
      + Empirical (empDis)
      + Geometric (geom)
      + Negative Binomial (nbinom)
      + Poisson (pois)
      + Uniform (dunif)
  + Continuous Distributions
      + Empirical (empCont)
      + Exponential (exp)
      + Gamma (gamma)
      + Inverse Gamma (invgamma)
      + Inverse Gaussian (invgauss)
          + Wald
      + Inverse Weibull (invweibull)
      + Log Logistic (llogis)
          + Fisk
      + Logistic (logis)
      + Lognormal (lnorm)
      + Normal (norm)
      + Uniform (unif)
      + Weibull (weibull)
